issue.title: [CF 815] Grouping Grow Direction Faulty, SHOULD BE EASY FIX!!!
issue.body:
Problem explained by several people thoroughly: http://us.battle.net/wow/en/forum/topic/7004697382 The issue I am personally having is with a 4 column by 4 row Grouping. I would like to have my cooldowns look like this below. Having the shortest shortest cooldown on the top left in row 1 column 1, than the 2nd shortest in row 1 column 2. If I need to explain this better plz let me know and I will gladly do. Row 1 >> 3s, 15s, 22s, 24s, << Row 2 >> 28s, 2m, 5m,__ << Row 3 >> __, __, __, __ << Row 4 >> __, __, __, __ <<
> Posted by CurseForge user Tantrim | Imported from CurseForge issue #815 | Raw

comments.body:
Please post the export string of the group that you are having trouble with. To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" ... "Group" option, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

Also, could you show me a text example (like what you did above for what you want it to look like) of what the group looks like for you currently?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

First off, I want to say you are awesome and thanks for the speedy reply. Also, I have played wow for many years and this is by far one of my favorite if not the favorite addon I have ever used!

> Posted by CurseForge user Tantrim

That is the export string of a text layout, not a group.

I don't need it, though, because I know what the problem is. Here is the solution:

Keep your layout direction set to "Right then Down".

Set your sort priorities as follows:

  1. Icon Shown (Respect Always Hide) - HIGH
  2. Duration - LOW
  3. Icon ID - LOW

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks a ton man. You're awesome

RESOLVED


> Posted by CurseForge user Tantrim
